name: ThingM.GitHub.io
body:
### Welcome to ThingM Github.

This page lists the Github repositories by the ThingM team.

### Projects

blink(1) USB light -- http://blink1.thingm.com/
- https://github.com/todbot/blink1

BlinkM Smart LED -- http://blinkm.thingm.com/
- https://github.com/todbot/BlinkM-Examples
- https://github.com/todbot/BlinkM-Arduino
- https://github.com/todbot/BlinkMuino
- https://github.com/todbot/ReflashBlinkM
- https://github.com/todbot/LinkM
- https://github.com/todbot/CtrlM
- https://github.com/todbot/FreeM


### Support or Contact
Having trouble?  Contact us via the web at http://thingm.com/contact/ or contact info@thingm.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
